Package com.project.demo.controller

Class ContactController

java.lang.Object
com.project.demo.controller.ContactController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/contact") public class ContactController extends Object
Author:
Kaushik Boora. The API path for Contact is /api/v1/contact. This represents a Controller class for Contact. This class provides CRUD operation for the resource "Contact". This controller class provides following methods,
API description
HTTP MethodPathDescription
PUT/api/v1/contact Updates the contact with the provided contact
GET/api/v1/contactFetches all the contacts in the Database.
GET/api/v1/contact/{contactId} Fetches the contact whose Id is mentioned in the PathVariable.

    • getContact

      @GetMapping("/{contactId}") public com.project.demo.model.Contact getContact(@PathVariable("contactId") long contactId)
      Fetches the information of Contact whose ID is provided.
      Parameters:
      contactId - Id of the contact whose info needs to be fetched.
      Returns:

    • updateContact

      @PutMapping("/{contactId}") public com.project.demo.model.Contact updateContact(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid com.project.demo.model.Contact contact, @PathVariable("contactId") long contactId)
      Updates the contact with a new contact provided in the body.
      Parameters:
      contact - New Contact
      contactId - ID of the contact that must be updated.
      Returns:
      updated contact stored on DB
